title: The "I Will Keep You in Suspense" Edition
description:
David Plotz and Emily Bazelon are
joined by Slate Group chairman, Jacob Weisberg, to discuss
the
third Presidential debate and the possible danger zones that exist
for an opinionated journalist, like
Amy Goodman, covering a
protest.
Join

podcasts, and more. Sign up for a free trial today at
www.slate.com/gabfestplus.
